channel.title: More awesome!
channel.description: So I have a duel monitor setup, but its no ordinary setup! It uses a 10" monitor :eek: It runs at 640*480 and its well, AWESOME! I got this a while ago and when it was powered on it would make loud snaps and the picture would go fuzzy every time that happened! I got this for free and it didn't cost that much to get it repaired. Discuss! I use floppy disk for measurement.

item.title: More awesome!
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

Eh Pretty Easy:

This is a good example of a weird person. Did you know that OLD doesn’t necessarily mean good and working???

Actually its fine. It works. Im going to build a mini arcade cabinet. I just havnt got round to it…

[size=1pt]same goes for the relay cpu, usb 5.25 floppy drive, rebuild case of a computer i have, etc etc etc[/size]

Read full topic

this is a 20 year old crt!!!
